name: Caverns (itch) (TurquoiseParadox) (TurquoiseParadox)
description: This is a tower defense style game where the player also creates the path. You play as a dragon trapping greedy heroes who are after your treasure! Place down various types of monsters to kill these heroes and take their loot. As you level up and gain more gold, you can change up your path and explore different strategies to clear the waves of heroes.
